title: Where To Go In 2019
itunes:title: Where To Go In 2019
description:
Mark and Nikki break down Bloomberg’s list of the hottest destinations to consider for the upcoming months. Then, Foursquare co-founder Dennis Crowley explains his surprisingly old-school methods when he’s on the road.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
